verses.verse: כַּשֶּׁ֤לֶג ׀ <WH7950> As snow בַּקַּ֗יִץ <WH7019> in summer וְכַמָּטָ֥ר <WH4306> and as rain בַּקָּצִ֑יר <WH7105> in harvest כֵּ֤ן <WH3651> So לֹא־ <WH3808> is not נָאוֶ֖ה <WH5000> is not seemly לִכְסִ֣יל <WH3684> for a fool כָּבֽוֹד׃ <WH3519> so honour

כַּצִּפּ֣וֹר <WH6833> As the bird לָ֭נוּד <WH5110> by wandering כַּדְּר֣וֹר <WH1866> as the swallow לָע֑וּף <WH5774> by flying כֵּ֥ן <WH3651> So קִֽלְלַ֥ת <WH7045> so the curse חִ֝נָּ֗ם <WH2600> causeless [לֹא כ] (לֹ֣ו <WH3808> not ק) תָבֹֽא׃ <WH935> shall not come
שׁ֣וֹט <WH7752> A whip לַ֭סּוּס <WH5483> for the horse מֶ֣תֶג <WH4964> a bridle לַחֲמ֑וֹר <WH2543> for the ass וְ֝שֵׁ֗בֶט <WH7626> and a rod לְגֵ֣ו <WH1460> back כְּסִילִֽים׃ <WH3684> for the fool's

אַל־ <WH408> not תַּ֣עַן <WH6030> Answer כְּ֭סִיל <WH3684> not a fool כְּאִוַּלְתּ֑וֹ <WH200> according to his folly פֶּֽן־ <WH6435> Or תִּשְׁוֶה־ <WH7737> lest thou also be like לּ֥וֹ גַם־ <WH1571> will also אָֽתָּה׃ <WH859> you

עֲנֵ֣ה <WH6030> Answer כְ֭סִיל <WH3684> a fool כְּאִוַּלְתּ֑וֹ <WH200> according to his folly פֶּן־ <WH6435> lest יִהְיֶ֖ה <WH1961> become חָכָ֣ם <WH2450> lest he be wise בְּעֵינָֽיו׃ <WH5869> in his own conceit

מְקַצֶּ֣ה <WH7096> cutteth off רַ֭גְלַיִם <WH7272> the feet חָמָ֣ס <WH2555> damage שֹׁתֶ֑ה <WH8354> [and] drinketh שֹׁלֵ֖חַ <WH7971> He that sendeth דְּבָרִ֣ים <WH1697> a message בְּיַד־ <WH3027> by the hand כְּסִֽיל׃ <WH3684> of a fool
דַּלְי֣וּ <WH1809> are not equal שֹׁ֭קַיִם <WH7785> The legs מִפִּסֵּ֑חַ <WH6455> of the lame וּ֝מָשָׁ֗ל <WH4912> so [is] a parable בְּפִ֣י <WH6310> in the mouth כְסִילִֽים׃ <WH3684> of fools
כִּצְר֣וֹר <WH6887> binds אֶ֭בֶן <WH68> a stone בְּמַרְגֵּמָ֑ה <WH4773> in a sling כֵּן־ <WH3651> So נוֹתֵ֖ן <WH5414> so [is] he that giveth לִכְסִ֣יל <WH3684> to a fool כָּבֽוֹד׃ <WH3519> honour

ח֭וֹחַ <WH2336> [As] a thorn עָלָ֣ה <WH5927> goeth up בְיַד־ <WH3027> into the hand שִׁכּ֑וֹר <WH7910> of a drunkard וּ֝מָשָׁ֗ל <WH4912> so [is] a parable בְּפִ֣י <WH6310> in the mouth כְסִילִֽים׃ <WH3684> of fools

רַ֥ב <WH7227> The great מְחֽוֹלֵֽל־ <WH2342> [God] that formed כֹּ֑ל <WH3605> everyone וְשֹׂכֵ֥ר <WH7936> all [things] both rewardeth כְּ֝סִ֗יל <WH3684> the fool וְשֹׂכֵ֥ר <WH7936> and rewardeth עֹבְרִֽים׃ <WH5674> transgressors
כְּ֭כֶלֶב <WH3611> As a dog שָׁ֣ב <WH7725> returneth עַל־ <WH5921> unto קֵא֑וֹ <WH6892> to his vomit כְּ֝סִ֗יל <WH3684> [so] a fool שׁוֹנֶ֥ה <WH8138> returneth בְאִוַּלְתּֽוֹ׃ <WH200> to his folly
רָאִ֗יתָ <WH7200> Seest אִ֭ישׁ <WH376> thou a man חָכָ֣ם <WH2450> wise בְּעֵינָ֑יו <WH5869> affliction תִּקְוָ֖ה <WH8615> hope לִכְסִ֣יל <WH3684> of a fool מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <WH4480> than

אָמַ֣ר <WH559> [man] saith עָ֭צֵל <WH6102> The slothful שַׁ֣חַל <WH7826> [There is] a lion בַּדָּ֑רֶךְ <WH1870> in the way אֲ֝רִ֗י <WH738> a lion בֵּ֣ין <WH996> is in הָרְחֹבֽוֹת׃ <WH7339> [is] in the streets

הַ֭דֶּלֶת <WH1817> [As] the door תִּסּ֣וֹב <WH5437> turneth עַל־ <WH5921> on צִירָ֑הּ <WH6735> upon his hinges וְ֝עָצֵ֗ל <WH6102> so [doth] the slothful עַל־ <WH5921> on מִטָּתֽוֹ׃ <WH4296> upon his bed

טָ֘מַ֤ן <WH2934> hideth עָצֵ֣ל <WH6102> The slothful יָ֭דוֹ <WH3027> his hand בַּצַּלָּ֑חַת <WH6747> in [his] bosom נִ֝לְאָ֗ה <WH3811> it grieveth לַֽהֲשִׁיבָ֥הּ <WH7725> him to bring it again אֶל־ <WH413> to פִּֽיו׃ <WH6310> to his mouth
חָכָ֣ם <WH2450> [is] wiser עָצֵ֣ל <WH6102> The sluggard בְּעֵינָ֑יו <WH5869> in his own conceit מִ֝שִּׁבְעָ֗ה <WH7651> than seven men מְשִׁ֣יבֵי <WH7725> that can render טָֽעַם׃ <WH2940> a reason

מַחֲזִ֥יק <WH2388> [belonging] not to him [is like] one that taketh בְּאָזְנֵי־ <WH241> by the ears כָ֑לֶב <WH3611> a dog עֹבֵ֥ר <WH5674> He that passeth by מִ֝תְעַבֵּ֗ר <WH5674> [and] meddleth עַל־ <WH5921> with רִ֥יב <WH7379> with strife לֹּֽא־ <WH3808> not לֽוֹ׃
כְּֽ֭מִתְלַהְלֵהַּ <WH3856> As a mad הַיֹּרֶ֥ה <WH3384> [man] who casteth זִקִּ֗ים <WH2131> firebrands חִצִּ֥ים <WH2671> arrows וָמָֽוֶת׃ <WH4194> and death

כֵּֽן־ <WH3651> So אִ֭ישׁ <WH376> So [is] the man רִמָּ֣ה <WH7411> [that] deceiveth אֶת־ <WH853> רֵעֵ֑הוּ <WH7453> his neighbour וְ֝אָמַ֗ר <WH559> and saith הֲ‍ֽלֹא־ <WH3808> not מְשַׂחֵ֥ק <WH7832> Am not I in sport אָֽנִי׃ <WH589> I

בְּאֶ֣פֶס <WH657> Where no עֵ֭צִים <WH6086> wood תִּכְבֶּה־ <WH3518> goeth out אֵ֑שׁ <WH784> is [there] the fire וּבְאֵ֥ין <WH369> there נִ֝רְגָּ֗ן <WH5372> so where [there is] no talebearer יִשְׁתֹּ֥ק <WH8367> ceaseth מָדֽוֹן׃ <WH4066> the strife

פֶּחָ֣ם <WH6352> [As] coals לְ֭גֶחָלִים <WH1513> [are] to burning coals וְעֵצִ֣ים <WH6086> and wood לְאֵ֑שׁ <WH784> to fire וְאִ֥ישׁ <WH376> man [מִדֹונִים כ] (מִ֝דְיָנִ֗ים <WH4066> brawling ק) לְחַרְחַר־ <WH2787> to kindle רִֽיב׃ <WH7379> strife פ

דִּבְרֵ֣י <WH1697> The words נִ֭רְגָּן <WH5372> of a talebearer כְּמִֽתְלַהֲמִ֑ים <WH3859> [are] as wounds וְ֝הֵ֗ם <WH1992> and they יָרְד֥וּ <WH3381> and they go down חַדְרֵי־ <WH2315> into the innermost parts בָֽטֶן׃ <WH990> of the belly

כֶּ֣סֶף <WH3701> with silver סִ֭יגִים <WH5509> dross מְצֻפֶּ֣ה <WH6823> covered עַל־ <WH5921> and חָ֑רֶשׂ <WH2789> [are like] a potsherd שְׂפָתַ֖יִם <WH8193> lips דֹּלְקִ֣ים <WH1814> Burning וְלֶב־ <WH3820> heart רָֽע׃ <WH7451> and a wicked

[בִּשְׂפָתֹו כ] (בִּ֭שְׂפָתָיו <WH8193> band ק) יִנָּכֵ֣ר <WH5234> dissembleth שׂוֹנֵ֑א <WH8130> He that hateth וּ֝בְקִרְבּ֗וֹ <WH7130> within יָשִׁ֥ית <WH7896> and layeth up מִרְמָֽה׃ <WH4820> deceit

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> When יְחַנֵּ֣ן <WH2603> fair ק֭וֹלוֹ <WH6963> When he speaketh אַל־ <WH408> not תַּֽאֲמֶן־ <WH539> believe בּ֑וֹ כִּ֤י <WH3588> When שֶׁ֖בַע <WH7651> him not for [there are] seven תּוֹעֵב֣וֹת <WH8441> abominations בְּלִבּֽוֹ׃ <WH3820> in his heart

תִּכַּסֶּ֣ה <WH3680> is covered שִׂ֭נְאָה <WH8135> [Whose] hatred בְּמַשָּׁא֑וֹן <WH4860> by deceit תִּגָּלֶ֖ה <WH1540> shall be shewed רָעָת֣וֹ <WH7451> his wickedness בְקָהָֽל׃ <WH6951> before the [whole] congregation

כֹּֽרֶה־ <WH3738> Whoso diggeth שַּׁ֭חַת <WH7845> a pit בָּ֣הּ יִפֹּ֑ל <WH5307> shall fall וְגֹ֥לֵ֥ל <WH1556> therein and he that rolleth אֶ֝בֶן <WH68> a stone אֵלָ֥יו <WH413> about תָּשֽׁוּב׃ <WH7725> it will return

לְֽשׁוֹן־ <WH3956> tongue שֶׁ֭קֶר <WH8267> A lying יִשְׂנָ֣א <WH8130> hateth דַכָּ֑יו <WH1790> [those that are] afflicted וּפֶ֥ה <WH6310> mouth חָ֝לָ֗ק <WH2509> by it and a flattering יַעֲשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> worketh מִדְחֶֽה׃ <WH4072> ruin
